fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, turn a player into Mac.
- At night, turn a player into Cheese.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players are not informed if they have been turned into Mac or Cheese.
- When a Mac and a Cheese visit each other, you will deal a basic attack to the more evil one. Evilness from most evil to least evil: Evil Faction Role > Framed players > Kill Capable Neutral Role > Evil Neutral Role or other roles which want town to lose > Kill Capable Role > Players who have killed before > Townies/Good Roles > Good players whose roles have been publicly revealed such as mayor or revived players
- If two players are on the same evilness level you kill one randomly
- If you kill a townie you kill yourself
